    IRmiApplication, IComponent, IHasAttributes, IConfigurable, IRegisterable, Serializable, Remote

    public class RmiApplication
extends RMIApplicationBase
implements IRmiApplication
    This singleton object represents the Application - ie the Catalys Server.

      • getSession

        public ISession getSession(String externalCompID,
                           String externalSubID,
                           String externalLocationID,
                           String ourCompID,
                           String ourSubID,
                           String ourLocationID)
                    throws RemoteException
        Exposed to RMI
        Specified by:
        getSession in interface IRmiApplication
        Parameters:
        externalCompID - CompID of party with whom we want a Session.
        externalSubID - SubID of party with whom we want a Session.
        externalLocationID - LocationID of party with whom we want a Session.
        ourCompID - CompID by which we are known to external party.
        ourSubID - SubID by which we are known to external party.
        ourLocationID - LocationID by which we are known to external party.
        Returns:
        Session for given id's. Null if no such session is known.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - if a communication-related problem occurs

      • getRmiSession

        public RmiSession getRmiSession(IConnectionPoint connectionPoint,

        Returns a RmiSession for the given party, creating one if necessary. Used internally - not exposed to RMI.
        Parameters:
